alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 9:11AM PDT until April 04 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia, Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Showers or thunderstorms this afternoon will have the capability of producing localized gusts in excess of 45 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia
